---
title: "/k"
---

<!-- This file is generated by scripts/wiki/renderCommandsDoc.ts. -->

[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Send your minion to kill things.

**Usage**

- `/k name:<string> [quantity:<integer>] [method:<string>] [show_info:<boolean>] [wilderness:<boolean>] [solo:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The thing you want to kill. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The amount you want to kill. | - |
| `method` | `string` | No | If you want to cannon/barrage/burst. | - |
| `show_info` | `boolean` | No | Show information on this monster. | - |
| `wilderness` | `boolean` | No | If you want to kill the monster in the wilderness. | - |
| `solo` | `boolean` | No | Solo (if its a group boss) | - |

**Examples**

- `/k name:zulrah`
